nodes.title: Harvester
nodes.excerpt: Harvester is a full-stack application founded by JP Evans to promote local businesses and make shopping locally as convenient as possible. Using the online Marketplace, users can browse products from local store then grab that product in the same day. JP is an former hockey teammate of mine that I was fortunate enough to keep […]

nodes.title: HotPuck
nodes.excerpt: HotPuck is a simple and quick project to help spice up any pickup hockey game! It is a scoreboard clone of the popular `NHL Threes Moneypuck` intended for small area or pond game use.
